mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tbl_event.* from tbl_event) where rn between 1 and 10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_event(e_no, id, e_title, e_regdate, e_content) values(seq_eno.nextval, #{id}, #{e_title}, sysdate, #{e_content})
mapper.update: update tbl_event set e_title = #{e_title}, e_content = #{e_content} where e_no = #{e_no}
